name: Game Balance Options
description:
1. Disable magics & treasures with Dimension Door & Fly abilities(suitable for advanced players):
- Magic: Dimension Door, Fly;
- Treasures: Angel Wings, Phoenix's Spell Book, Spellbinder's Hat & Tome of Air Magic do not randomly spawn on the map. Remove Dimension Door & Fly from Phoenix's Spell Book;
2. Weaken the sencondry skills (Necromancy, Diplomacy) & combined treasures (Cloak of the Undead King, Diplomat's Cloak & VCMI Enhancement Shield).
author: like

chinese.name: 游戏平衡选项
chinese.description:
1.禁用以下含飞跳功能的魔法和宝物（适合高级玩家）：
- 魔法：异次元之门、飞行奇术；
- 宝物：炽天之翼、凤凰魔法书、魔法师之帽、气系魔法书不在地图随机刷新，删除凤凰魔法书中的异次元之门和飞行奇术；
2.削弱辅助技能（招魂术、外交术）和组合宝物（鬼王斗篷、外交官斗篷、VCMI增强盾）。
